mapper.sql: id, phoneNum, username, password, salt, dharmaName, province, city, sex, sign, headPic, status, date
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, phoneNum, username, password, salt, dharmaName, province, city, sex, sign, headPic, status, date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dharmaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into user
id,
phoneNum,
username,
password,
salt,

province,

sex,
sign,
headPic,
status,
date,

mapper.update:
update user
phoneNum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dharmaName = #{dharmaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
headPic = #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set phoneNum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dharmaName = #{dharmaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headPic = #{headpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from user where phoneNum=#{phoneNum} and password=#{password}
